channel.description: Recent content on The Silicon Safari

item.title: Database Design Using Hash Indexes
item.description: Hi Guyz, This is alanturrr1703. This is my first blog, and I really don’t know what I am doing. But I will be writing these just for fun; some blogs might have some good points that might actually work for someone, but honestly, these blogs are my notes of the things that I am actually interested in. Why Do We Need Databases? Starting with database design using Hash Indexes. Now, what is really the need for databases?
